help_general:
ğŸ“± *General Commands*
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

help_admin:
ğŸ‘‘ *Admin Commands*
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

`/approve <user_id>` - Approve a user
`/activate <user_id>` - Activate a user
`/deactivate <user_id>` - Deactivate a user
`/addadmin <user_id>` - Add a new admin
`/removeadmin <user_id>` - Remove an admin
`/listadmins` - Show all admins
`/pending` - Show pending users
`/stats <user_id>` - Show user statistics

pair_menu_prompt: Please select an expiration time for analysis:
welcome_promo: ğŸš€ Ready to start trading? Sign up here to get started with our platform!
trade_feedback_thanks: Thank you! Your feedback has been recorded.
mode_smc_active: ğŸ§  **SMC Mode Active** - Pure Smart Money Concepts
mode_smc_description:
â€¢ Higher accuracy, fewer signals
â€¢ Best for trending markets
mode_standard_active: âš¡ **Standard Mode Active** - Hybrid TA + SMC
mode_standard_description:
â€¢ More opportunities, moderate accuracy
â€¢ Best for ranging markets
mode_info_standard_desc:
â€¢ Combines traditional technical analysis with SMC concepts
â€¢ **Indicators:** RSI, Support/Resistance, Candlestick patterns, MACD, Bollinger Bands, Moving Averages
â€¢ **Signal Priority:** SMC first, then traditional TA fallback
â€¢ **Flexibility:** Higher (requires 2-3 conditions)
â€¢ **Best For:** Beginners, ranging markets, higher frequency trading
â€¢ **Risk:** Medium (more signals, moderate accuracy)
mode_info_smc_desc:
â€¢ Uses exclusively institutional trading concepts
â€¢ **Features:** Swing analysis, Break of Structure (BOS), Order Blocks, Fair Value Gaps (FVG), Liquidity levels
â€¢ **Signal Priority:** SMC only (no fallback)
â€¢ **Flexibility:** Lower (strict validation required)
â€¢ **Best For:** Experienced traders, trending markets, higher conviction trades
â€¢ **Risk:** Lower (fewer signals, higher accuracy)
mode_info_standard_when:
â€¢ **Use Standard Mode when:**
  - Market is ranging/sideways
  - You want more trading opportunities
  - You're learning trading concepts
  - Volatility is low
mode_info_smc_when:
â€¢ **Use SMC Mode when:**
  - Market is trending strongly
  - You want higher quality signals
  - You're experienced with SMC
  - Volatility is high
mode_info_switch: ğŸ”„ **Switch Modes:** Use the toggle button in the main menu
mode_info_track: ğŸ“Š **Track Performance:** Check your trade results for mode-specific stats
mode_stats_better_standard: âš¡ Standard Mode is currently performing better
mode_stats_better_smc: ğŸ§  SMC Mode is currently performing better
mode_toggle_smc_enabled: ğŸ§  SMC Mode enabled! All signals will use Smart Money Concepts logic.
mode_toggle_standard_enabled: âš¡ Standard Mode enabled! All signals will use retail TA logic.

â€¢ Select assets from Regular or OTC menu

help_mode_desc:
â€¢ Toggle between Standard and SMC modes
â€¢ Use Mode Info button for detailed explanations
â€¢ Track performance in trade results
